turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order food for tonight from the pizza place?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For sure, the one downtown?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes as that is my favorite location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What were you wanting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large Supreme on pan crust. The pasta with the breadsticks . A large on thin crust half with cheese only and half with pineapple and bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have family size tuscani pasta or large which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Family size please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I am placing the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh and add 2 2 liters of soda too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so the 2 liters are 2 for 5$ the family size tuscani pasta is $10.89 and there is a sale for 2 large specialty pizzas for $25.99

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so let me make sure this is right, Large Supreme pizza on pan crust. The Family size tuscani pasta. A large on thin crust half with cheese only and half with pineapple and bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you remember the breadsticks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh yes, The family size tuscani pasta comes with a pan of 5 breadsticks. Is that enough?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will do!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me place the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright , same payment arrangements as usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your order is complete and it will be available for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
